description: Mobile techniques used by WireLurker, ATT&CK software S0312 v1.1
name: WireLurker (S0312)

techniques.comment: WireLurker monitors for iOS devices connected via USB to an infected OSX computer and installs downloaded third-party applications or automatically generated malicious applications onto the device.
WireLurker obfuscates its payload through complex code structure, multiple component versions, file hiding, code obfuscation and customized encryption to thwart anti-reversing.
